alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 3:14PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR EAST WALKER RIVER IN LYON COUNTY IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of western Nevada along the East Walker River below Bridgeport Reservoir, including the following county, Lyon. * WHEN...Until further notice. Prolonged flooding is likely. * IMPACTS...Flooding is expected to impact East Walker Road and other low lying areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 305 PM PDT, Flooding will result in the advisory area from an upstream dam floodgate release combined with increased snowmelt. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southern Lyon County, including East Walker Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
